title: FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUUUUUUCK
body: I AM SO BORED PLS HELP ME I WANT TO PLAY LEAGUE AND I CANT I HAVE TRYED EVERY SINGLE METHOD BUT ITS NOT WORKING THIS NEW FACKING CLIENT IS TRASH I PRESS LAUNCH IT LOADS FOR 2 SECONDS AND THEN IT CLOSES PLEASE HELP ME RIOT OR ANYONE AM BORED OF MY LIFE I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO I CANT EVEN PLAY WILD ONES REMAKE...oh wait i can its fixed but pls help me

replies.body: If the client is popping up and then disappearing, your OS might actually be blocking the program from opening correctly. Do me a favor and update your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if that was the main issue, but if that doesn't help hit me back up!
it didn't worked...btw every time I reinstall it it has only one step witch says "upgrating your client" and when its done my client icon its the same as before
Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as they can look a little more thoroughly at what might be forcing that client to close out.
I cant I lost my email
